sections.heading: Overview
content:
Christine Beard is a longtime vegetarian and animal rights activist, as well
as the author of Become a Vegetarian in Five Easy Steps! , and the
co-author of the New Vegetarian Baby: An Entirely New, Updated Edition of
the Classic Guide to Raising Your Baby on the Healthiest Possible Diet ,
with Sharon Yntema.

Beard is a native Californian who lives in San Francisco with her partner
David, a cellist, and their cat. She holds degrees in mathematics and physics,
and is a certified nutrition educator and diet counselor in the San Francisco
Bay Area.
